document_notes.text:
This update for obs-scm-bridge fixes the following issues:

  Updated to version 0.5.4:
  - CVE-2024-22038: Fixed DoS attacks, information leaks with crafted Git repositories (bnc#1230469)

notes.text: Various problems in obs-scm-bridge allows attackers that create specially crafted git repositories to leak information of cause denial of service.
